reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly and is very patient with students.

reviews.review: Provides good examples and makes the class engaging. Assigns a lot of homework though.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: Very knowledgeable but speaks too fast. Hard to keep up with the lectures sometimes.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Amazing professor, always available for extra help and very friendly.

reviews.review: Course material is challenging, but the professor explains it well. The exams are tough.

reviews.review: Focuses more on theory than practical applications. Not very engaging.

reviews.review: Excellent professor, very approachable and always encourages questions.

reviews.review: Sometimes hard to follow, but provides good study materials.

reviews.review: Class is interesting, but the professor is often late to lectures.

reviews.review: Very strict with deadlines, but teaches the material well.
